text: Andinosaura crypta is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Andinosaura Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 2011 Category:Taxa named by Santiago J. Sánchez-Pacheco Category:Taxa named by David A. Kizirian Category:Taxa named by Pedro M. Sales-Nunes
title: Andinosaura crypta
